pros: Natural formula provides 24 hours of soft skin
Moisturizes and keeps legs soft and smooth
Some customers have said they felt like it kept their legs smoother for longer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and Smells Great!
customer_reviews.text: The product smells amazing and gives such a smooth shave without drying my skin out. I've been using this for about six months and am so glad I switched from regular shaving gel. As other reviewers noted, this goes on more like a lotion. If you are used to traditional shaving gels, you definitely have to adjust to using less and rinsing your razor more frequently (or it will clog your razor). My biggest complaint is that the bottle design prevents the pump from getting out like the last 1/4 of the product - wish they would fix the bottle design.
customer_reviews.author: Alex!

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t go very far...
customer_reviews.text: The stuff I typically use was not available for subscribe to save so I was looking for another option. This won’t be it. I didn’t get but a couple of weeks or so of shaves out of this. I had to lay it on pretty thick otherwise I did get razor burn. It comes out like lotion/conditioner so it didn’t “lather” or foam in any way which I prefer. It’s way too expensive for how long it lasted. I get just as close of a shave using a bottle of conditioner (which is what I’ve always used in bikini line/under arms) and its way cheaper. It smells good and is moisturizing, but that’s about it.

customer_reviews.title: Runs thin and left a chemical burn
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 23 year old female. Do NOT use this cream if you shave bikini style. After lathering, I ended up getting symptoms reminiscent of a UTI- burning when I pee and constant discomfort. A trip to the doctor confirmed it was not bacterial and instead a chemical burn- i.e. THIS PRODUCT. I shave regularly and have used other soaps/creams that never did me as much harm as EOS Ultra Moisturizing Shave Cream, Vanilla. Yeesh. Even for a leg shaving cream it ran thin and didn't protect me from cuts. Not impressed with their "1 pump should do it" promise. All in all, dissatisfied and will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice and seems to make skin soft, but as a shaving cream this is one of the worst I've used. Not sure why there are so many good reviews. I had so many nicks from this my whole leg was bleeding, and I used a new Gillette razor. I usually use Cremo which is the best I've ever used, but I was curious to try this. Never again. I'd rather pay a couple more dollars for the Cremo. I've never once got nicked from it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda panda

customer_reviews.title: READ IF YOU WORK IN HEALTHCARE!  This one smells like peri wipes!
customer_reviews.text: First off, I love this brand and it’s the only shaving cream I’ve used for years! However, I just bought my first bottle of the vanilla scent yesterday. I am a nurse, and a dreaded work-smell association was made. Ladies, if you work in healthcare and use the perineal wipes in the blue package at your facility, DON’T BUY THE VANILLA. I swear to you, it smells exactly like those wipes. Buy any other scent and do buy this brand; the others all smell great!
